title: Google Chrome security advisory (AV25-151)
description: On March 19, 2025, Google published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Stable channel Chrome for desktop  versions prior to 134.0.6998.117/118 (Windows and Mac) and 134.0.6998.117 (Linux)
Extended stable channel  versions prior to 134.0.6998.89 (Windows and Mac)
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
